overview: It was the ancient Spartans who first advocated the idea that an army of soldiers who were lovers was a better fighting force than your typical everyday militia – a notion the director is clearly keen to explore. New recruits are soon discovering what this unique philosophy entails, as their pert twink asses are stretched to the limit by some of the hottest recruits in the ranks. The result? Oodles of hot Czech jizz from the boys in khaki that’ll have you tossing off volley after pent-up volley...
title: Band Of Bareback Brothers: Part 1
